text: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo is a 2011 neo-noir psychological thriller movie based on the 2005 novel by Swedish writer Stieg Larsson. It was directed by David Fincher. It is about journalist Mikael Blomkvist's investigation to find out what happened to a girl from a wealthy family who disappeared 40 years prior. He hires the help of Lisabeth Salander, a computer hacker. == References == Category:2011 thriller movies Category:2011 LGBT movies Category:2010s psychological movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Swedish LGBT movies Category:Swedish thriller movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:British thriller movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Norwegian LGBT movies Category:Norwegian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by David Fincher Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies about journalists Category:Movies about missing people
title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011 movie)
